name: Bordeaux Na Mona Fire Log 1.00 Kilograms
description: Follow us on: Facebook and Twitter
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Preparation_and_Usage>Read instructions on base of pack before lightingStep 1Leave Firelog in wrapper and place in empty grate with red Lighting Strip towards you and the arrows pointing downwards.Step 2 Pull side seams of wrapper outwards to create an airspace between the wrapper and the Firelog.Step 3Light the edge of the Lighting Strip. Sit back and enjoy a beautiful fire.Bord na MÃ³na Firelog Instructions:1. Do not remove or tear wrapper. Light the red Lighting Strip.2. This Firelog provides a flame. Use on its own for the first 1 1/2 hours and after this you may add fuel as required to extend your enjoyment of a real fire.3. Do not chop into pieces. Do not poke log. Do not use in barbecue or closed appliance.4. Burn only one log at a time. In an emergency use sand or a very wet towel to extinguish fire.</Preparation_and_Usage></Cooking_Instructions>
PromotionDescription: £4 off when you spend £20 on selected Household products on Tesco.com
